breadcrumbs.title: How to pay and where to buy tickets and Oyster

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["Many overseas agents sell London travel tickets if you're planning your trip to London."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
Save time and money by buying a Visitor Oyster card or a Travelcard before you leave home. Ask individual agents for more details.
